message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget, but $12,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet at $13,000. I would like to propose $12,500 as a compromise. This is my final offer.
